snippet: The police said that they had arrested 150 people in raids at casinos and hotels across Macau after a spate of violent assaults raised fears of a revival of gang warfare in Macau.
abstract: Police say they have arrested 150 people in raids at casinos and hotels across Macau after a spate of violent assaults raised fears of a revival of gang warfare there.
lead_paragraph: The police said that they had arrested 150 people in raids at casinos and hotels across Macau after a spate of violent assaults raised fears of a revival of gang warfare in Macau.
